sentence.text: She felt sorry she had disturbed the usual calmness of a man she respected , but considered she could not apologize to him without either offending or encouraging him .
I am really very sorry about this , but the eviction notice has been granted .
` Look , I 'm really truly sorry , Iris , but this is important . "
I 'm so sorry to cause such a lot of trouble but I did n't know what else to do . "
Lying close by his side in the carved and canopied bed , her head on his chest , she whispered , ` I 'm so sorry about the ring .
And now I am sorry I came back .
And I 'm sorry I shouted at you . "
` I 'm sorry if I was rude to you , too , Mr Morgan . "
“ I 'm sorry if it embarrassed you … ”
She was n't sorry she 'd told them what she had .
` I 'm sorry about that , ma'am .

Always before , after similar wickednesses , she had felt almost gleeful triumph , but this time , although she was not truly sorry for what she had done to Mrs Darrell , she felt something like remorse .
Clarissa opened her door and said she was sorry for being so hopeless on the telephone .
I 'd liked her until the money lending began , and I was sorry for being unkind to her .
` I 'm not sorry for being angry over that , " he said , surprisingly .

The police say they 're considering charges against the 3 youths , but add that the youths now realise how foolish they were to fire the replica in the street and are deeply sorry for frightening the family .
They all said that they were amazed with Randolph 's performance last night and that they were very sorry for teasing him .
After my success , I was less sorry about deserting the stockade .
His sorry tale is one long whinge about his own suffering -- his lack of sex , his loneliness , his sleeplessness .
Through Judd , sole survivor of the enterprise , the treasure gone and his companions dead , the sorry tale is pieced together .
" I 'm awfully sorry , Chief Rabbit , " said Hazel .
We are all terribly sorry and worried about this , as we do n't know what has happened .
